fields.Body: Airtable is __intuitive__ and __easy to use__. _I'm writing these docs right in my browser!_
fields.Title: It's easy to use.

fields.Body: The API makes it a _fantastic_ choice for hosting data you need to read or write elsewhere.
fields.Title: The API is amazing.

fields.Body: Airtable works for all kinds of use-cases-- __like gatsby documentation__!
fields.Title: It's flexible.

fields.Body: Markdown is [simple](https://gist.github.com/jonschlinkert/5854601) to write and just works!
fields.Title: It's very simple.

fields.Body: Markdown is way more maintainable than other doc and text formats., because it's just text!
fields.Title: It's maintainable.

fields.Body:
### Don't write sketchy html!

Just write markdown!
fields.Title: It's safe.

fields.Body:
Gatsby is awesome because we can write react components and do all the fancy things that react can do, easy.

![react logo](https://d2eip9sf3oo6c2.cloudfront.net/tags/images/000/000/026/square_256/react.png)
fields.Title: It uses React!

fields.Body: Gatsby compiles to static pages, so they are __wicked fast__.
fields.Title: It's crazy fast.

fields.Body:
__So many great plugins__ make sourcing and transforming a breeze.

Can't wait to see what's possible in the future!
fields.Title: It has amazing plugins!
